ptxt.intxrefpoff: Timing Chain Cover Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT

servinfosub.title: Oil Seal
servinfosub.ptxt: Check oil seal lip for fault or other damage. Replace as necessary.

servinfosub.title: Timing Chain Cover
servinfosub.ptxt: Inspect strainer (1) of oil passage for driving intake cam timing sprocket assembly (VVT actuator).
If clog or foreign matter exists, clean strainer.
